room_title: Escape room "Special Ops: Mysterious Market" by The Escape Game Orlando in Orlando
review: Had a blast with family and other group. We escaped with about 4mins left. The special ops room was awesome. But all their rooms are very good. Staff is always nice and friendly. Thanks Escape game Orlando.

room_title: Escape room "Special Ops: Mysterious Market" by The Escape Game Orlando in Orlando
review: Great atmosphere and the crew working was very nice! The escape room we dod was Special Ops and it was a lot of fun. We were able to escape and used almost all of the hour to solve the incident which was a fair amount of time given the difficulty was an 8 out of 10. Looking forward to doing another escape room as this was a great time!

room_title: Escape room "Special Ops: Mysterious Market" by The Escape Game Orlando in Orlando
review: Spent a great day at the Escape Game Orlando. Went for fathers day 2019 for the special ops game and had a very good time. Employees were very helpful and good at giving those little hints to help keep the game moving when we got stalled.

room_title: Escape room "Special Ops: Mysterious Market" by The Escape Game Orlando in Orlando
review: i absolutely loved going to the escape game. their rooms are super fun and challenging and their employees are a 10/10. specifically stacy. her customer service was so amazing and she was so funny and sweet. she even offered to take pictures for us at the end and everyone in my group absolutely adored her. i've been to multiple escape rooms in mulptiple different states, and she was by far the greatest employee that's helped me. love my girl stacy (if she's reading this i'm apart of that volleyball group that did prison break and special ops hehe)

room_title: Escape room "Special Ops: Mysterious Market" by The Escape Game Orlando in Orlando
review: Super friendly staff! We came to Orlando for vacation, and decided to take a detour away from the hordes of people in the amusement parks. We're big fans of escape rooms, so this wasn't our first experience, and I have to say this company has the best rooms. We've done all of them. Special Ops and Mission: Mars are my favorites.
